description: For a tasty vegetarian centrepiece, you can't go past this vegetable tart featuring flaky pastry, creamy ricotta filling and roast vegetables.
name: Italian-Inspired Vegetable & Ricotta Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Using an electric mixer, beat eggs, ricotta, feta and dried herbs in a large bowl for 2 minutes or until smooth. Fill tart shell with ricotta mixture. Arrange zucchini, tomato, onion and half of the basil over filling. Bake for 35 minutes or until ricotta has set. Allow to cool slightly. Serve topped with remaining basil.

Arrange zucchini, tomato, onion and half of the basil over filling. Bake for 35 minutes or until ricotta has set. Allow to cool slightly. Serve topped with remaining basil.
